description: Pro-independence figure Roger Torrent claims the Spanish government targeted his phone with spyware.
title: Top Catalan politician accuses Spain of 'political spying'
title_page: Top Catalan politician accuses Spain of 'political spying' - BBC News
maintext: "This is the first time that we have concrete confirmation of what many of us knew and had been denouncing... We knew that illegal practices were being directed against the independence cause. Now we have certain proof," he said.
